document_data.name: Arakon
document_data.mainbody: '''Arakon''' was an [[archmage]] who attacked the [[barbarian]] tribes of [[Icewind Dale]] with a band of mercenaries.
document_data.History: The archmage fought the tribes of the [[Uthgardt]] and [[Reghedmen]], but when his army appeared to have been beaten, Arakon opened a portal to the [[Lower Planes]]. To save both sides from the [[demon]] hordes, the [[shaman]] [[Jerrod]] sacrificed himself by throwing himself into the [[gate]] and creating the [[Jerrod's stone]] which destroyed the passageway to the [[plane]]: [[Baator]].
